newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan's caretaker premier sworn in.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan's caretaker premier sworn in.

text.p: Pakistan's caretaker Prime Minister Meraj Khalid took his oath of office on Tuesday, replacing sacked prime minister Benazir Bhutto.
President Farooq Leghari administered the oath to the 80-year-old politician at the presidential palace in Islamabad in a ceremony shown recorded on state television.
Leghari earlier dissolved parliament, sacked Bhutto's three-year-old government and named Khalid to head a caretaker administration to supervise general elections on February 3.
